channel.title: 2017 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in 2017 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: in Akihabara for last lesson of 2017
item.description: 17:54 Thursday 14 December 2017 JST After working 3 hours (5 lessons) near Lazona, I’m eating cold lunch in Akihabara across the street from GG lesson. I have Lin’s sister’s heavy-as-hell suitcase. (Now I know why gorillas cannot break them) 19:41 Lesson was great; everyone was there! Yoko, Maki, and Atusko all brought sweets! Mayumi and Toshie both did homework!

item.title: made pottery
item.description: 11:04 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST We just made some pottery with an chill old man sensei. I made a mobius strip for Fred, an upside-down plate for me, a dice shaker and two dice for my students.

item.title: State of My Life Address
item.description: 20:50 Monday 31 July 2017 JST Today was the first day to teach at a restaurant in Hiroo. 10 students, most of whom are beginners, but all were able to get through some language, including, but not punctuated as, “how many in your party please follow me here you are here is the menu what would you like to drink please let me know when you are ready to order” and “this is sirloin sukiyaki may I help you prepare it we recommend rare but how would you like it cooked this is our original sauce dip the sirloin in egg wrap it around rice and enjoy”
